# migadu_rewrites (Data Source)

Fetches all rewrite rules for a Migadu domain (INDEX operation).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "migadu_rewrites" "example" {
  domain_name = "example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain_name` (String) The domain name.

### Read-Only

- `rewrites` (Attributes List) List of rewrite rules for this domain. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rewrites))

<a id="nestedatt--rewrites"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rewrites`

Read-Only:

- `destinations` (List of String) List of destination email addresses.
- `local_part_rule` (String) The local part matching rule (supports wildcards).
- `name` (String) The name of the rewrite rule.
- `order_num` (Number) Order number for rule processing (lower numbers processed first).
